answer:
You can have a TB skin test on the same day as a live vaccine or 4 weeks later. Chickenpox (varicella) or measles, mumps, rubella (MMR) are examples of live vaccines.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## You can have a TB skin test on the same day as a live vaccine or 4 weeks later.

Chickenpox (varicella) or measles, mumps, rubella (MMR) are examples of live vaccines.
Immunization Nurse
question: Is it okay to do TB test on the same day of second dose of varicella?
